data.title: Soul bearer
data.meta_description: The soul bearer is an item that sends all of the ensouled heads from their inventory to the player's bank. To use the soul bearer, the player must pick up the ensouled head(s) and select the 'Fill' option on the Soul Bearer. It is obtained from the Bear Your Soul miniquest after the Key Master repairs the damaged soul bearer. It is an ancient artefact that draws souls from one place to another, enabling them to travel within the River of Souls across the dimensions.
data.text:
Soul bearerReleased19 May 2016 (Update)MembersYesQuest itemNoPropertiesTradeableNoEquipableNoStackableNoNoteableNoOptionsFill, Check, Uncharge, DropExamineIt can carry an ensouled head away to a place of safety.ValuesValue8 coinsHigh alch4 coinsLow alch3 coinsWeight0.45 kgAdvanced dataItem ID19634

The soul bearer is an item that sends all of the ensouled heads from their inventory to the player's bank. To use the soul bearer, the player must pick up the ensouled head(s) and select the 'Fill' option on the Soul Bearer. It is obtained from the Bear Your Soul miniquest after the Key Master repairs the damaged soul bearer. It is an ancient artefact that draws souls from one place to another, enabling them to travel within the River of Souls across the dimensions.

Each ensouled head costs one charge. Charging the soul bearer costs one blood rune and one soul rune per charge (currently costing 482). The soul bearer can hold 1,000 charges (currently costing 482,000) and charges can be removed at any time by using the Uncharge right-click option.

If a player loses the soul bearer, they can acquire another one by using a spade to dig in the Arceuus church crypt again.
